name: Quest Meister
description:
In this strategy game you play as headmaster of a small guild that is destined to save the world. In this unique blend of global strategy and text adventure only you choose the destiny.

Hire heroes, send them on missions, uncover secrets of archipelago and defeat forces of evil. 

Game is currently in development, this version is work in progress. Any opinions are welcome, so leave a comment with you thoughts on the game!
